 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁכַךְ‎</span>] **verb** ==decrease, abate== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁכִיכָה‎</span> is ***allaying*** of anger; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁכֵּךְ אֹזֶן‎</span> ***soothe, satisfy*** the ***ear*** (so apparently [[BDB#Dalm|Dalm]]), i.e. allow it to hear and understand, compare [[BDB#Levy|Levy]]<sup>NHWB</sup> (and Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be narrow have small ears, be deaf***, [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>90</sup>); — Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> see ***humble oneself***, Wahrm ***humiliate***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּשֹׁכוּ‎</span> [[Gen.8.1|Gen 8:1]] the waters ***abated***; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּשֹׁךְ‎</span> [[Esth.2.1|Esth 2:1]] when ***abated*** the king's wrath, so ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁכָ֑כָה‎</span> [[Esth.7.10|Esth 7:10]]. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּשַׁךְ יְקוּשִׁים‎</span> [[Jer.5.26|Jer 5:26]] usually ***like the bending, crouching, of fowlers*** (this meaning for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁךְ‎</span> dubious; [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּשֻׁר‎</span> [[BDB#Du|Du]] strike out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ישׁור כשׁ‎</span>, then reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִלְכֹּדוּ׃‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺקְשִׁים הִצִּיבוּ בַּשַּׁחַת א‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 1 singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַהֲשִׁכֹּתִ֫י מֵעָלַי‎</span> [[Num.17.20|Num 17:20]] ***I will allay from upon me the murmurings*** (accusative), etc.
